Nightlight brushed and followed him.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
> : : Rodimus Prime / Kup : :
> 
> Both Rodimus and Kup looked relieved that Blackfang was under 
control.
> 
> Rodimus Prime: Lock him in the brig and then find out what the hell 
is wrong with him.
> 
> Rodimus walks over to Nightlight.
> 
> Rodimus Prime: Come on, everything is ok. Let's finish was we 
started. 
> 
> He kissed her on the cheek lightly. He motioned for her to follow 
as he walks off towards his quarters.
> 
> Kup comes over to Razael.
> 
> Kup: Now where were we lass?
